mapper.select:
select AVG (Speed) as speed, TO_CHAR(DataDate,'mi')||':00' as periodDate,
TO_CHAR(DataDate,'mi') || ':' || case when To_number(TO_CHAR(DataDate,'ss'))<15 then '00' when To_number(TO_CHAR(DataDate,'ss'))<30 then '15' when To_number(TO_CHAR(DataDate,'ss'))<45 then '30'
else '45' end as dataDate from TapWaterRealTimeData WHERE
DataDate >= #{beginDate} and DataDate <= #{endDate}
GROUP BY TO_CHAR(DataDate,'mi')||':00',
TO_CHAR(DataDate,'mi') || ':' || case when To_number(TO_CHAR(DataDate,'ss'))<15 then '00' when To_number(TO_CHAR(DataDate,'ss'))<30 then '15' when To_number(TO_CHAR(DataDate,'ss'))<45 then '30'
else '45' end
